@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@
+= AWS Lambda Plugin
+
+The plugin provides functionality to interact with https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/[AWS Lambda].
+
+== Installation
+
+.build.gradle
+[source,gradle,subs="attributes+"]
+----
+implementation(group: 'org.vividus', name: 'vividus-plugin-aws-lambda', version: '{current-version}')
+----
+
+include::partial$aws.adoc[]
+
+== Steps
+
+=== Invoke a Lambda function
+
+Invoke a Lambda function by providing the function name and the payload to pass to the Lambda function.
+
+[source,gherkin]
+----
+When I invoke Lambda function `$functionName` with payload `$payload` and save result to $scopes variable `$variableName`
